name: octave.vim
summary: Send Octave code from a VIM buffer to Octave
description:
Send Octave code from a VIM buffer to Octave using funnel.pl from vimscript #221. Contains

README.octave_with_vim
ftplugin/octave.vim
ftplugin/funnel.pl

ftplugin/funnel.pl is from Larry Clapp (vimscript #221). It is used for creating 
a pipe that Octave is listening to.

You can help improving these files via my subversion repository at http://kriemhild.uft.uni-bremen.de/svn/vim
install_details: See README.octave_with_vim. You will need some perl modules for funnel.pl.
